Sentencas: Migration of residual pores in partially sintered 8mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia under an electric field was investigated.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia

Sentencas: To avoid shrinkage via sintering, Ar-filled bubbles introduced to dense ceramic were also studied.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia

Sentencas: Pores/bubbles were found to migrate against the field, e.g., under 1.9V at 875 degrees C, a temperature when cation diffusion is supposed to have frozen according to the prevailing consensus.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia

Sentencas: Pore/bubble movement left contorted grains in some samples, but not at lower temperatures and higher fields when they apparently pass through grain boundaries without causing any visible distortion.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia

Sentencas: These results are explained by a surface diffusion model and a temperature-pore-size map that delineates two distinct modes of pore/boundary pinning and breakaway.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia

Sentencas: The implications of these results to solid oxide fuel cells and electrolysis cells are explored.
Titulo: Ionomigration of Pores and Gas Bubbles in Yttria-Stabilized Cubic Zirconia
